title: Audio Visualizer
summary: Party like it's 2999 with a colorful display responding to any ambient sound.
developerAddress:

description: Party like it's 2999 with a colorful glowing display on your phone, tablet or at your wrist that dynamically changes with any ambient sound or music, in real-time.    Already more than 80 different music visualizers, and it keeps growing!Round and square screens are supported for Wear.You can always try the free version at http://goo.gl/juYNgV     Concern about the energy impact?Our tests showed that it can easily run continuously for more than 3 hours and a half on a smartwatch and far more on a regular device. Most consumed energy is in fact taken by the screen, not by the app itself.    About RECORD_AUDIO permissionNeeded only to acquire audio from the microphone in order to generate the visualization reacting to the sound. Nothing is saved at all.
descriptionHTML:
Party like it's 2999 with a colorful glowing display on your phone, tablet or at your wrist that dynamically changes with any ambient sound or music, in real-time.

Already more than 80 different music visualizers, and it keeps growing!
Round and square screens are supported for Wear.
You can always try the free version at http://goo.gl/juYNgV


Concern about the energy impact?
Our tests showed that it can easily run continuously for more than 3 hours and a half on a smartwatch and far more on a regular device. Most consumed energy is in fact taken by the screen, not by the app itself.

About RECORD_AUDIO permission
Needed only to acquire audio from the microphone in order to generate the visualization reacting to the sound. Nothing is saved at all.
comments: Man, got this when it first came out in 2014, left Android Wear and now back.  Dude, the app improved so much. Keep up the good work.
Very happy with the purchase. All components are well polished and all basic functionality is covered. You wont be disappointed.
Fantastic! Exactly what I was looking for! :) Great visuals, love it! ðŸ¤£

SOLD!!! Audio visualization for the watch!!!  Great options, and excellent execution.  I'm purchasing this right now!  This gets people's attention just about anywhere! Especially in bars, clubs, and parties!
I love the app I bought the app within minutes of using the demo version i loved it that much thanks.
recentChanges: New renderers, more features, performances improvements and bug fixes
